title: Drawing, "Advertisement for a Furrier", ca. 1936
medium: Brush and black, blue gouache, silver paint on thick paper
signed: Signed in black gouache, lower left: McK. K.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A black fox is seen from behind, turning its head toward the viewer. It has silver eyes with blue pupils. Lower left, in monogram: SL.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Advertisement for a Furrier", ca. 1936.
ca. 1936. Brush and black, blue gouache, silver paint on thick paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-697.
